```{r load packages, message=FALSE}
library(tigris)
library(zonebuilder)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(ggspatial)
library(units)
library(ggthemes)
library(units)
library(nngeo)
library(dplyr)
```
```{r}
busstop <- st_read("https://github.com/cambridgegis/cambridgegis_data/raw/main/Trans/Bus_Shelters/TRANS_BusShelters.geojson", quiet = TRUE)
zipcode <- st_read("https://github.com/cambridgegis/cambridgegis_data/raw/main/Boundary/Zip_Codes/BOUNDARY_Zipcodes.geojson", quiet = TRUE)
```


```{r}
MA_state_plane <- "+proj=lcc +lat_1=41.71666666666667 +lat_2=42.68333333333333 +lat_0=41 +lon_0=-71.5 +x_0=200000 +y_0=750000.0000000001 +ellps=GRS80 +datum=NAD83 +to_meter=0.3048006096012192 +no_defs"

busstop <- busstop %>%
  st_transform(MA_state_plane)
zipcode <- zipcode %>%
  st_transform(MA_state_plane)
```


```{r}
ggplot(busstop)+
  geom_sf(color = "Red", size = 2)+
  geom_sf(data = zipcode, color = "Lightgray", fill = NA, size  = 0.75)+
  theme_map()+
  annotation_scale()
```
```{r}
zipcode_buffer <- st_buffer(zipcode, dist = 1) %>%
  st_union()

ggplot(zipcode_buffer)+
  geom_sf()+
  theme_map()
```


```{r}
busstop_zipcode <- busstop[zipcode_buffer,]

ggplot(zipcode_buffer)+
  geom_sf()+
  geom_sf(data = busstop_zipcode,
          color = "darkred",
          size = 2)+
  theme_map()
```
```{r}
busstop <- busstop %>%
  st_join(zipcode) %>%
    mutate(by_zipcode = !is.na(ZIP_CODE))
```


```{r}
zipcode <- zipcode %>%
  mutate(num_busstop = lengths(st_covers(zipcode,busstop)))

ggplot(zipcode)+
  geom_sf(color = NA,
          aes(fill = num_busstop))+ 
  scale_fill_viridis_c(name = "Boston zipcode\nby number of busstop",
                       breaks = breaks <- seq(0,30, by = 4),
                       labels = paste(prettyNum(breaks),
                                      "busstop"))+
  annotation_scale(location = "br")+
  annotation_north_arrow(location = "tr",
                         style = north_arrow_minimal())+

theme_map()+
  theme(
    legend.position = "left",
    legend.background = element_rect(fill = alpha("white", 0.5),
                                         color = "gray"))
```
